Text: This is my first attempt at making a torrent so please take it easy on me.
You may need to seed more.

Thank you for posting and for the wealth of background information that comes with it. Unfortunately, unless you are prepared to seed your upload, we shall neither be able to read the actual book, nor to seed the torrent in our turn.
Seeding or at least trying to. Had an automatic restart. I'll keep it going for as long as I can. My UL connection isn't real fast.
